abstract: Dow Chemical is prepared to pay a penalty for delaying its proposed acquisition of chemical maker Rohm & Haas, the company’s chief executive, Andrew Liveris, told The Financial Times.
lead_paragraph: Dow Chemical is prepared to pay a penalty for delaying its proposed acquisition of chemical maker Rohm & Haas, the company’s chief executive, Andrew Liveris, told The Financial Times.

headline.main: Dow May Delay Rohm & Haas Deal, Chief Says

abstract: Citadel Investment Group‘s main hedge funds lost 53 percent for 2008, Dow Jones reported, citing a person familiar with Citadel’s preliminary estimates.
lead_paragraph: Citadel Investment Group‘s main hedge funds lost 53 percent for 2008, Dow Jones reported, citing a person familiar with Citadel’s preliminary estimates.

headline.main: Citadel’s Main Funds Fell 53% in 2008, Report Says
